mapper.select: SELECT POPUP_KEY, POPUP_TITLE, ACTIVED, START_DATE_TIME, END_DATE_TIME, POSITION_X, POSITION_Y, SIZE_X, SIZE_Y, POPUP_LINK, POPUP_FILE_KEY, CREATE_MEMBER_KEY, CREATE_DATE_TIME, UPDATE_MEMBER_KEY, UPDATE_DATE_TIME FROM TB_POPUP WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY ACTIVED DESC , START_DATE_TIME DESC LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_POPUP WHERE 1=1

SELECT POPUP_KEY, POPUP_TITLE, ACTIVED, START_DATE_TIME, END_DATE_TIME, POSITION_X, POSITION_Y, SIZE_X, SIZE_Y, POPUP_LINK, POPUP_FILE_KEY, CREATE_MEMBER_KEY, CREATE_DATE_TIME, UPDATE_MEMBER_KEY, UPDATE_DATE_TIME FROM TB_POPUP WHERE POPUP_KEY = #{popupKey}

SELECT POPUP_KEY, POPUP_TITLE, ACTIVED, START_DATE_TIME, END_DATE_TIME, POSITION_X, POSITION_Y, SIZE_X, SIZE_Y, POPUP_LINK, POPUP_FILE_KEY FROM TB_POPUP WHERE ACTIVED = true AND NOW() BETWEEN START_DATE_TIME AND END_DATE_TIME
